title: Analysis and Application Strategies of Virtual Character-Based K-12 Learning Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational technology and K-12 education experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are science education majors, with the goal of gaining practical understanding of instructional design utilizing virtual characters.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the effects of virtual characters on K-12 learners' cognition and motivation
Learners can present at least three core considerations for virtual character design based on meta-analysis research findings
Learners can create a step-by-step process for designing smartphone-based virtual character learning activities in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
